name: Rosewill RC-404 Gigabit Ethernet PCI Network Adapter
Features: [Jumbo Frame Support: 7680Bytes, Slot: 1 BOOTROM slot, VLAN tagged Ethernet frames support., Contains two independent send and receive large-capacity FIFO buffer., Supports up to 128K-byte Flash memory/Boot-ROM interface., Support the parallel / cross-line automatic identification (Auto MDI / MDIX), simplify network deployment, maintenance., Integrated high-capacity, independent of the send / receive FIFO buffers High integration, high-performance single-chip.]
